All competitors are unethical, including you (not you specifically, just "the self"). All a matter of perspective.

No- just the basics. Time to go back to doctor and develop a plan.

DOn't they eat your balls when they get upset? Not the kind of creature to piss off.
They found that I'd written on social engineering, and tried to target me for that. I think they do organize the book...
Yeah, it's a BS marketing thing. I've seen them before, but first time one hit me up.

No idea- they claim to be real, but there are a ton of these marketing BS organizations out there if u can't get published
